Author: ddmar
Text: I fucking love chocolate with nuts. I've started eating several tablespoons of cocoa powder mixed with a little bit of salt and a ton of Swerve for much fewer calories. Don't want to give tips, but when you eat swerve in this quantity, you also tend to drink a ton of water, and sometimes, I end up purging a lot of it unintentionally > . <

Author: vanillacola77
Text: Chocolate with nuts. Not only everything you described with the chocolate but also feeling whole peanuts come back up is cringeworthy, each lump passing through. Also borderline puts me in panic mode because one might get stuck in my throat and Iâ€™ll die.
